name: Karol Stefan Mazur
body:
### Hi,
I'm Karol S. Mazur. ~~I just finished my undergraduate degree in International Affairs and moved to Krakow to switch things up. I am now pursuing an education in Computer Science.~~ Whew, nevermind! That was in 2011. Now it's 2014 and I'm happy to have been part of the [Applicake](http://www.applicake.com/team/#karol) family. I now work at [Base](http://getbase.com/) on their iOS app. I'm still discovering the black box that is Computer Science, albeit only in the little bits of free time that I can muster.

### Me, elsewhere
- [Twitter](http://twitter.com/karolsmazur)
- [Pinboard](http://pinboard.in/u:nvln)
- [GitHub](http://github.com/ksm)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
